subSubSection.paragraph: MEXICO : Temascaltepec, Tejupilco—Hinton ( 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ), Brown ( 1972 ). PERU : Tingo Maria—Spangler ( 1966 ), Brown ( 1972 ).
BRAZIL : Santa Catarina: Nova Teutônia—Hinton ( 1936 a), Blackwelder ( 1944 ), Brown ( 1972 ).

GUATEMALA : Vera Paz, San Joaquín—Sharp ( 1882 ), Hinton ( 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ), Brown ( 1972 ). MEXICO : Altisco, Temascaltepec, Real de Arriba, Tejupilco, Morelos, Cuernavaca –Hinton ( 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).
MEXICO : Temascaltepec, Tejupilco, Morelos, Cuernavaca, Sierra de Durango, Cuautla—Hinton ( 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ),Brown ( 1972 ).
BRAZIL : Santa Catarina: Águas Mornas (=Theresopolis)—Grouvelle ( 1889 ), Hinton ( 1940 d), Passos et al . ( 2009 ).
COSTA RICA : San José, Coronado—Hinton ( 1940 d).
GUATEMALA : Vera Paz, San Joaquin—Sharp ( 1882 ), Hinton ( 1940 d), Brown ( 1972 ). MEXICO : Morelos, Cuernavaca, Temascaltepec, Tejupilco—Hinton ( 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).
PERU : Tulumayo—Spangler ( 1966 ), Brown ( 1972 ). GUATEMALA : Cahabon—Sharp ( 1882 ), Blackwelder ( 1944 ), Hinton ( 1971 d).
TOBAGO : Providence River—Hinton ( 1971 d).

TRINIDAD : Maracas Valley, Maraval River, St. Ann’s River, Curumpalo River, Curucaye River, Cimaronero River, St. Cruz River, Garden River, Cuare River, Marianne River, St. Joseph River, Arima River—Hinton ( 1971 d).
MEXICO : Temascaltepec, Tejupilco—Hinton ( 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ), Brown ( 1972 ).
